name: py-nbqa

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Run any standard Python code quality tool on a Jupyter Notebook.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ipython
dependencies.description:
IPython provides a rich toolkit to help you make the most out of using
Python interactively.

dependencies.name: py-tokenize-rt
dependencies.description: A wrapper around the stdlib `tokenize` which roundtrips.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.
